thread.title: Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game
thread.title_full: Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game

title: Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game
text: > Pennsylvania Side judge who missed clock runoff suspended 1 game FILE - In this Monday, Oct. 12, 2015 file photo, line judge Sarah Thomas, left, talks with side judge Rob Vernatchi as the San Diego Chargers play the Pittsburgh Steelers during the second half of an NFL football game in San Diego. The NFL has suspended side judge Rob Vernatchi for one game for not managing the clock properly in the fourth quarter of Pittsburgh's game at San Diego on Monday night. (AP Photo/Lenny Ignelzi, File)
